title: Train Delay on East West Line

updates.text: Trains are running slightly slower than normal due to wet tracks. Please allow extra time for travel.
Trains are running slightly slower than normal due to wet track. Please allow extra time for travel.
[EWL]: Train services from #JurongEast towards #Redhill are now operating normally.
[EWLINE] UPDATE: Fault is cleared. Expect minor delays from  #JurongEast towards #Redhill. Trains and platforms are crowded.
[EASTWESTLINE]: Trains are delayed from #JurongEast to #Redhill towards PasirRis due train fault. Estimated delay: 10 mins
